And <S%G2532><s%> was transfigured <S%G3339><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> did shine <S%G2989><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sun, <S%G2246><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light. <S%G5457><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had lifted up <S%G1869><s%> their <S%G848><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> no man, <S%G3762><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> only. <S%G3441><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I brought <S%G4374><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> cure <S%G2323><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
